text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Apprentice barber" means an individual who, under the supervision of a master barber, is learning to practice barbering in a barbershop that holds a barbershop permit.
"Barber" means an individual who practices barbering.

section.section: "Barbershop" means any commercial establishment, except a beauty salon, in which an individual practices barbering.
"Barbershop" does not include a clinic in a barber school.

text.section: "Barbershop permit" means a permit issued by the Board to operate a barbershop.
"Board" means the State Board of Barbers.

section.section: "License" means, unless the context requires otherwise, a license issued by the Board to practice barbering.

"License" includes, unless the context requires otherwise, each of the following licenses:
a master barber license; and
a barber license.

text.section:
"Master barber" means a barber who:
has at least 15 months experience as a licensed barber; and
has passed a test approved by the Board.
